title: Hilarious moment little girl picks up her baby sister by the HEAD
text:
A father has been left confused after finding a hilarious video of his daughter lifting her younger sister up by her head.

Ruben Castaneda and Andrea Ortiz Pena from Midland in western Texas shared the clip of their children after spotting it on the family iPad.

The older of the two girls speaks to the camera to explain they are making chocolate milkshakes.

After listing the ingredients, she calls for her younger sister to join her, adding 'she has crazy hair'.

The older of the two girls (left) speaks to the camera to explain they are making chocolate milkshakes

The girl tells her sister to 'say hi', but she is too short for the camera so she picks her up by the head to get her in view

But the youngest child appears to get camera shy and only responds to demands of 'come here, come here'.

The girl tells her sister to 'say hi', but she is too short for the camera so she picks her up by the head to get her in view.

The child's face is completely contorted as her sister pushes her cheeks in, with what appears to be chocolate around her mouth.

Mr Castaneda said: 'So the wife was going thru my daughter's I pad and saw these videos she made. And well this one popped up.

The child's face is completely contorted as her sister pushes her cheeks in, with what appears to be chocolate around her mouth

Ruben Castaneda (left) and Andrea Ortiz Pena (right) from Midland in western Texas shared the clip of their children after spotting it on the family iPad

'Y'all watch til the end. My poor baby lol. (Note) I did get onto her about this.'

The young girl later picked her sister up again, but this time under the arms and the toddler's face looked normal.

The older of the two explains: 'She's been eating an Oreo again.'

The footage was shared by Mr Castaneda on his Facebook page and went viral, racking up 200,000 shares, 100,000 likes and 236,000 comments.

One person commented: 'I don't even know what to say about this one lmao, baby almost had her neck broke.'

Another added: 'Bahaha! That poor baby lmao!.'
description: Ruben Castaneda and Andrea Ortiz Pena from Midland, western Texas shared the clip of their children after spotting it on the family iPad.
